moves.name: Body Slam
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores an ally’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Strike Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Attack and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.effect: The user also takes 25% of the damage it dealt to the target.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Revenge Boost 1
passives.description: Has a chance (20%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
